info.name: Enrive Dark
info.description:
This is a dark theme for enrive.org to be used with chromium/chrome.
It's based on edits from this theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/131569/masterchan-dark
info.additionalInfo:
Credit goes to the orginial creator of the Masterchan dark them:
https://userstyles.org/users/350854
